<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/77e5dcc36a82da040072d74e3ced410d15c42757|patch 8.2.1704: Vim9: crash in for loop when autoload script has an e…>
patch 8.2.1704: Vim9: crash in for loop when autoload script has an error

Problem:    Vim9: crash in for loop when autoload script has an error.
Solution:   Reset suppress_errthrow.  Check for NULL list. (closes #6967)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1704: Vim9: crash in for loop when autoload script has an e… · vim/vim@77e5dcc

attachments.text: …rror Problem: Vim9: crash in for loop when autoload script has an error. Solution: Reset suppress_errthrow. Check for NULL list. (closes #6967)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/213da551dec465e193619684b260bf9d5a8d6afc|patch 8.2.1703: ":highlight clear" does not restore default link>
patch 8.2.1703: ":highlight clear" does not restore default link

Problem:    ":highlight clear" does not restore default link.
Solution:   Remember the default link and restore it. (Antony Scriven,
            closes #6970, closes #4405)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1703: ":highlight clear" does not restore default link · vim/vim@213da55
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1703: ":highlight clear" does not restore default link · vim/vim@213da55
attachments.text: Problem: ":highlight clear" does not restore default link. Solution: Remember the default link and restore it. (Antony Scriven, closes #6970, closes #4405)

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/da697645d5917eb3d4168c06c3442bef9fb746bf|patch 8.2.1702: crash when using undo after deleting folded lines>
patch 8.2.1702: crash when using undo after deleting folded lines

Problem:    Crash when using undo after deleting folded lines.
Solution:   Check for NULL pointer. (closes #6968)

attachments.title: patch 8.2.1702: crash when using undo after deleting folded lines · vim/vim@da69764
attachments.text: Problem: Crash when using undo after deleting folded lines. Solution: Check for NULL pointer. (closes #6968)
